name: Neon Alley
description: Do you long for a simpler time when things were totally rad? When you could hang out at the arcade all day and shoot Skee-Ball while listening to gnarly synthesizer tunes? Are you ready to ascend to the next level of ball-rolling challenge? Well my friend, this might be the game for you. Strap on your fingerless gloves and prepare to warm up your alley bowling skills for a retrowave journey down Neon Alley.
